org.reprap.devices.pseudo
Class LinePrinter

java.lang.Object
  org.reprap.devices.pseudo.LinePrinter

public class LinePrinter
extends java.lang.Object

This is a pseudo device that provides an apparent single device for plotting lines.

moveTo

public void moveTo(int endX,
                   int endY,
                   int movementSpeed,
                   boolean stopExt,
                   boolean closeV)
            throws java.io.IOException
Move to a 2-space point in a direct line. At the moment this is just the pure 2D Bresenham algorithm. It would be good to generalise this to a 3D DDA.

Parameters:
